memberdef.name: AV_RB48
memberdef.initializer: (((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[0] << 40) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[1] << 32) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[2] << 24) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[3] << 16) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[4] << 8) | \ (uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[5])

memberdef.name: AV_RL48
memberdef.initializer: (((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[5] << 40) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[4] << 32) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[3] << 24) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[2] << 16) | \ ((uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[1] << 8) | \ (uint64_t)((const uint8_t*)(x))[0])

memberdef.name: AV_COPY128U
memberdef.initializer: do { \ AV_COPY64U(d, s); \ AV_COPY64U((char *)(d) + 8, (const char *)(s) + 8); \ } while(0)
